category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_user_query_filter
preference.preference_description: Defines a set of conditions that an LDAP object must satisfy to be matched as a user object for synchronizing with Teamcenter. This optional preference allows administrators familiar with LDAP query filter syntax to use a more sophisticated object matching mechanism. Valid values: Accepts a single string. Must be in LDAP query filter syntax.
